#define TAO_READ_GUARD (  MUTEX,
OBJ,
LOCK    ) 
 

Value:

ACE_Read_Guard<MUTEX> OBJ (LOCK); \
if (OBJ.locked () == 0) \
  TAO_THROW (CORBA::UNKNOWN (TAO_DEFAULT_MINOR_CODE, CORBA::COMPLETED_NO));
